meanings.sent1: The rabbits procreated many baby bunnies.
meanings.sent2: The birds procreated in the springtime to expand their flock.
meanings.sent3: The flowers procreated so much that the garden was overflowing with new blooms.
meanings.sent4: The fish procreated in the river, filling it with new life.
meanings.sent5: The insects procreated, creating a buzzing and bustling ecosystem.
